ValidationRule.description: If the Data Change field is "Yes", the New Custom Script field must be filled-in Updated Per NICC-038406
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(OR(RecordType.Name = 'Hosted RFC',RecordType.Name = 'HRM RFC',RecordType.Name = 'PMS RFC'), ISPICKVAL( Data_Change__c ,"Yes"),ISBLANK(TEXT( New_Custom_Script__c )))
/* ORIGINAL CODE RecordTypeId = "0126000000016TJ" && ISPICKVAL( Data_Change__c ,"Yes") && ISBLANK(TEXT( New_Custom_Script__c )) */
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If the Data Change field is set to Yes, you must update the New Custom Script field.
